categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Das letzte Kommando is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of The Last Command. It is a full-cast scripted audio play based on the German version of the novel, similar to the English-language radio drama versions of the original trilogy. The CDs were released by IMAGA in 2014 as part of a series adapting the entire Thrawn Trilogy.
